MessageSubject: You have been invited to join SIIWII by {param1}
MessageBody:
Hello,

{param3} {param4} is happy to invite you to become part of the SIIWII community to start
connecting and collaborating with like - minded businesses in your industry.

SIIWII is a global B2B apparel marketplace with a social media aspect, connecting you to
the outside world. We believe connectivity lies in the heart of good and successful
business between companies involved in the apparel supply chain and generates
opportunities for collaborating on innovative projects.
Here are some great perks you get for becoming a member on SIIWII

  • Be part of a exhilarating community and become globally connected again in your industry.
  • Generate global reach and awareness for your products and services by storytelling with videos and photos through SIIWII's social media feed
  • Get exposure for your products and services by displaying them in the global B2B marketplace.
  • A chance to collaborate on innovative projects with potential partners right on the platform



Ready to get started? Click the link below to set up your account to start connecting,
collaborating and transacting.
{param2}/account/register?Tenantid={param5}&TenantName={param1}

We look forward to welcoming you as a new member of the SIIWII community
Global connectivity to your industry awaits you!
Best regards
The SIIWII team
